attributes.action: Allow parents to remove children from school for holiday for max 2 weeks a year.
attributes.additional_details: Save the courts and councils time enforcing something they clearly are having trouble doing and wasting tax payers money fighting tax payers
attributes.background: To take this burden away from schools and courts but allow parents to remove children for either a two week holiday or two one week holidays per year but not directly near exam time. Also to reduce the cost of holidays but also improve tourism throughout the year
